mapper.select: select money, order_enddate as month from(select order_unitprice*order_count as money, order_unitprice, order_enddate from order_deli where order_enddate between #{g_date_2, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} and #{g_date_1, mode=IN, jdbcType=VARCHAR, javaType=java.lang.String} ) where order_unitprice is not null order by order_enddate
